tile.nuclearcraft.ore.copper.name: 銅礦
tile.nuclearcraft.ore.tin.name: 錫礦
tile.nuclearcraft.ore.lead.name: 鉛礦
tile.nuclearcraft.ore.thorium.name: 釷礦
tile.nuclearcraft.ore.uranium.name: 鈾礦
tile.nuclearcraft.ore.boron.name: 硼礦
tile.nuclearcraft.ore.lithium.name: 鋰礦
tile.nuclearcraft.ore.magnesium.name: 鎂礦
tile.nuclearcraft.ingot_block.tin.name: 錫塊
tile.nuclearcraft.ingot_block.lead.name: 鉛塊
tile.nuclearcraft.ingot_block.boron.name: 硼塊
tile.nuclearcraft.ingot_block.graphite.d: 石墨塊只在當與至少一個反應爐單元相鄰時才會被啟動。啟動的石墨塊會增加反應爐的效率，但也會產生額外的熱量。每一個啟動石墨塊增加的能量為%s，額外的熱量為%s。
鈹塊只在與至少一個反應爐單元相鄰時才會被啟動。啟動的鈹塊會增加反應爐的效率。但也會產生額外的熱量。每一個啟動鈹塊增加的能量為%s，額外的熱量為%s。
info.moderator.power: 相鄰的反應爐單元的能量為：基礎能量*單元效率/%s RF/t
info.moderator.heat: 相鄰的反應爐單元的熱量為：基礎熱量*單元效率/%s H/t
tile.nuclearcraft.fission_block.casing.d: 用在分裂堆結構中。要形成一個有效結構，需要建造一個由反應爐外殼構成的立方體框架，確保要*不包括*稜邊。然後將一個反應爐控制器放在稜，角或者結構的某一個面的一塊。如果介面顯示了錯誤，確保結構是有效的，然後在反應爐內部放入反應爐單元，冷卻器和減速劑方塊來開始從分裂燃料中獲得能量！
tile.nuclearcraft.fission_block.blast.de: 具有很高的爆炸抗性並能完美用於防爆設施的方塊。
tile.nuclearcraft.reactor_casing_transpa: 用在分裂堆結構中。要形成一個有效結構，需要建造一個由反應爐外殼構成的立方體框架，確保要*不包括*稜邊。然後將一個反應爐控制器放在稜，角或者結構的某一個面的一塊。如果介面顯示了錯誤，確保結構是有效的，然後在反應爐內部放入反應爐單元，冷卻器和減速劑方塊來開始從分裂燃料中獲得能量！
tile.nuclearcraft.fusion_connector.name: 融合連接器
tile.nuclearcraft.fusion_connector.desc: 將一個融合核心連接到它的電磁體環。融合核心四個面都需要連接器的連接。
tile.nuclearcraft.cell_block.name: 反應爐單元
tile.nuclearcraft.cell_block.desc: 用在分裂反應爐中以容納分裂燃料。單元放得越多，燃料消耗也就越快。%s
info.moderator.cell: 相鄰的單元會互相提高效率，或者用減速劑方塊連接起來，最長%s格，同時以另一個單元為結尾。
tile.nuclearcraft.cooler.empty.name: 空冷卻器
tile.nuclearcraft.cooler.water.name: 水冷卻器
tile.nuclearcraft.cooler.water.desc: 必須與至少一個反應單元或一個有效的減速劑方塊相鄰。
tile.nuclearcraft.cooler.redstone.name: 紅石冷卻器
tile.nuclearcraft.cooler.redstone.desc: 必須與至少一個反應爐單元相鄰。
tile.nuclearcraft.cooler.quartz.name: 石英冷卻器
tile.nuclearcraft.cooler.quartz.desc: 必須與至少一個有效的減速劑方塊相鄰。
tile.nuclearcraft.cooler.gold.name: 金冷卻器
tile.nuclearcraft.cooler.gold.desc: 必須與至少一個有效的水冷卻器和一個有效的紅石冷卻器相鄰。
tile.nuclearcraft.cooler.glowstone.name: 螢光石冷卻器
tile.nuclearcraft.cooler.glowstone.desc: 必須與至少兩個啟動的減速劑方塊。
tile.nuclearcraft.cooler.lapis.name: 青金石冷卻器
tile.nuclearcraft.cooler.lapis.desc: 必須與至少一個反應爐單元和一個反應爐外殼相鄰。
tile.nuclearcraft.cooler.diamond.name: 鑽石冷卻器
tile.nuclearcraft.cooler.diamond.desc: 必須與至少一個有效的水冷卻器和至少一個有效的石英冷卻器相鄰。
tile.nuclearcraft.cooler.helium.name: 液氦冷卻器
tile.nuclearcraft.cooler.helium.desc: 必須與恰好一個有效的紅石冷卻器和至少一個反應爐外殼相鄰。
tile.nuclearcraft.cooler.enderium.name: 終界金屬冷卻器
tile.nuclearcraft.cooler.enderium.desc: 必須與位於角落的三個反應爐外殼相鄰。
tile.nuclearcraft.cooler.cryotheum.name: 凜冰冷卻器
tile.nuclearcraft.cooler.cryotheum.desc: 必須與至少兩個反應爐單元相鄰。
tile.nuclearcraft.cooler.iron.name: 鐵冷卻器
tile.nuclearcraft.cooler.iron.desc: 必須與至少一個有效的金冷卻器相鄰。
tile.nuclearcraft.cooler.emerald.name: 綠寶石冷卻器
tile.nuclearcraft.cooler.emerald.desc: 必須與至少一個有效的減速劑方塊和一個反應爐單元相鄰。
tile.nuclearcraft.cooler.copper.name: 銅冷卻器
tile.nuclearcraft.cooler.copper.desc: 必須與至少一個有效的螢光石冷卻器相鄰。
tile.nuclearcraft.cooler.tin.name: 錫冷卻器
tile.nuclearcraft.cooler.tin.desc: 必須在同一條軸上與兩個有效的青金石冷卻器相鄰。
tile.nuclearcraft.cooler.magnesium.name: 鎂冷卻器
tile.nuclearcraft.cooler.magnesium.desc: 必須與至少一個反應爐外殼和一個有效的減速劑方塊相鄰。
tile.nuclearcraft.reactor_door.name: 反應爐門
tile.nuclearcraft.reactor_trapdoor.name: 反應爐地板門
tile.nuclearcraft.block_ice.name: 超冷冰
tile.nuclearcraft.nuclear_furnace_idle.d: 使用鈾和釷的錠或粉作為燃料來高速冶煉物品。
tile.nuclearcraft.manufactory_idle.name: 小製造機
tile.nuclearcraft.manufactory_idle.desc: 一個有很多用處的方便機器。
tile.nuclearcraft.isotope_separator_idle: 將材料分離成它們的同位素。
tile.nuclearcraft.decay_hastener_idle.de: 強制使放射性材料衰變。
從廢棄燃料中提取材料。
tile.nuclearcraft.alloy_furnace_idle.des: 將基礎材料熔煉成合金。
tile.nuclearcraft.infuser_idle.name: 流體注入器
tile.nuclearcraft.infuser_active.name: 流體注入器
tile.nuclearcraft.melter_idle.name: 金屬熔化機
tile.nuclearcraft.melter_active.name: 金屬熔化機
tile.nuclearcraft.supercooler_idle.name: 超冷卻器
tile.nuclearcraft.electrolyser_idle.name: 電解機
tile.nuclearcraft.electrolyser_idle.desc: 將化合物分解成基本元素。
tile.nuclearcraft.irradiator_idle.name: 中子輻照器
tile.nuclearcraft.irradiator_idle.desc: 引發原子核結構的改變。
tile.nuclearcraft.irradiator_active.name: 中子輻照器
tile.nuclearcraft.ingot_former_idle.name: 金屬成型機
tile.nuclearcraft.ingot_former_idle.desc: 將熔融金屬冷卻成金屬錠或者寶石。
tile.nuclearcraft.pressurizer_idle.name: 壓縮機
tile.nuclearcraft.salt_mixer_idle.name: 鹽混合器
tile.nuclearcraft.salt_mixer_active.name: 鹽混合器
tile.nuclearcraft.crystallizer_idle.name: 結晶器
tile.nuclearcraft.dissolver_idle.name: 溶解器
tile.nuclearcraft.dissolver_active.name: 溶解器
tile.nuclearcraft.extractor_idle.name: 流體提取機
tile.nuclearcraft.extractor_active.name: 流體提取機
tile.nuclearcraft.centrifuge_idle.name: 離心機
tile.nuclearcraft.centrifuge_active.name: 離心機
tile.nuclearcraft.rock_crusher_idle.name: 碎石機
tile.nuclearcraft.rock_crusher_idle.desc: 碾碎岩石來獲得礦物粉。
tile.nuclearcraft.machine_interface.name: 機器介面
tile.nuclearcraft.machine_interface.desc: 自動化可以直接存取與該方塊相鄰的機器。最多只有存取一台相鄰機器。
tile.nuclearcraft.buffer.name: 快取器
tile.nuclearcraft.buffer.desc: 可以儲存最多一組物品，32000RF能量和16000mB流體。會向相鄰機器和液冷器輸出能量和材料。可以放在分裂結構的框架裡來當作反應爐介面。
tile.nuclearcraft.active_cooler.name: 液冷器
tile.nuclearcraft.active_cooler.desc: 充入冷卻劑來冷卻分裂反應爐或融合反應爐。必須放在融合結構內或者融合電磁環的對角。如果用於冷卻分裂反應爐，冷卻生效的要求於冷卻液對應的被動冷卻器相同，但液冷器不能被用於滿足其它冷卻器的放置規則。如果用於冷卻融合反應爐，如果在磁環完全相反處恰好也有冷卻器，冷卻效率會大大提升。
tile.nuclearcraft.bin.name: 垃圾桶
tile.nuclearcraft.fission_controller_idl: 建造一個多方塊反應爐需要用到反應爐外殼，反應爐單元，冷卻器和減速劑方塊！將控制器放在某條稜，某個角落或者是反應爐的某個面。
這是一個舊版本的控制器，會遵循舊版本的規則。
tile.nuclearcraft.fission_controller_new: 建造一個多方塊反應爐需要用到反應爐外殼，反應爐單元，冷卻器和減速劑方塊！將控制器放在某條稜，某個角落或者是反應爐的某個面。
建造一個多方塊反應爐需要用到反應爐外殼，反應爐單元，冷卻器和減速劑方塊！將控制器放在某條稜，某個角落或者是反應爐的某個面。
tile.nuclearcraft.fission_port.name: 分裂堆埠
tile.nuclearcraft.fission_port.desc: 將這個方塊放在分裂反應爐框架中原本是反應爐外殼的位置，但*不要*在頂面或者底面。如果一個控制器已經貼上了反應爐結構，那麼反應爐的物品庫存和能量儲存就可以透過這個方塊實現自動化。確保分裂堆埠的前面是面對著反應爐外部的。埠的前面在材質上有一點輕微的不同。
tile.nuclearcraft.rtg_uranium.name: 鈾RTG
tile.nuclearcraft.rtg_plutonium.name: 鈽RTG
tile.nuclearcraft.rtg_americium.name: 鋂RTG
tile.nuclearcraft.rtg_californium.name: 鉲RTG
tile.nuclearcraft.solar_panel_basic.name: 基礎太陽能板
tile.nuclearcraft.solar_panel_du.name: 貧鈾太陽能板
tile.nuclearcraft.solar_panel_elite.name: 精英太陽能板
tile.nuclearcraft.decay_generator.name: 衰變產能器
tile.nuclearcraft.decay_generator.desc: 透過相鄰的放射性方塊衰變的熱量來產能。一段時間後衰變為枯竭鈾塊或枯竭釷塊，產能也會減少。
tile.nuclearcraft.voltaic_pile_du.name: 貧鈾伏打電堆
tile.nuclearcraft.energy_storage.desc: 右鍵點擊側面來讀取能量等級，空手時Shift+右鍵點擊切換連接模式。潛行時放置會保留連接設定。
tile.nuclearcraft.fusion_core.name: 融合堆核心
tile.nuclearcraft.fusion_core.desc: 這是多方塊融合反應爐的中心部分。這個核心需要一圈正方形電磁體環環繞它，用反應爐連接器將這些磁鐵連接到核心的四個面上。電磁體環是需要中空的，而且對角上不需要電磁體（但是可以放液冷器）。確保遠處的角落也被完全削掉。
tile.nuclearcraft.fusion_dummy_side.name: 融合堆核心
tile.nuclearcraft.fusion_dummy_top.name: 融合堆核心
tile.nuclearcraft.salt_fission_controlle: 反應爐的核心 - 需要在側面置有一個才能成型。
tile.nuclearcraft.salt_fission_wall.name: 熔鹽反應爐外殼
tile.nuclearcraft.salt_fission_beam.name: 熔鹽反應爐橫梁
tile.nuclearcraft.salt_fission_beam.desc: 用於將反應爐分離的部分與側面相連接。
tile.nuclearcraft.salt_fission_vent.name: 熔鹽反應爐出入口
tile.nuclearcraft.salt_fission_vent.desc: 用於將燃料與冷卻劑輸入輸出反應爐。能夠向（從）正在輸入（輸出）的容器或加熱器輸出（輸入）。
tile.nuclearcraft.salt_fission_vessel.de: 儲存熔鹽反應爐分裂燃料和枯竭燃料的地方。潛行時對著另一個容器放置能複製每一面的設定。
tile.nuclearcraft.salt_fission_heater.de: 熔鹽冷卻劑加熱以進行反應爐冷卻的地方。冷卻劑必須遵守相應的放置規則才能發揮效用。潛行時對著另一個加熱器放置能複製每一面的設定。
tile.nuclearcraft.salt_fission_moderator: 熔鹽反應爐減速劑外罩
提升臨近啟動容器的效率。
tile.nuclearcraft.salt_fission_distribut: 放置在反應爐的側面 - 能夠將燃料分配到所有容器中，有速度限制。
tile.nuclearcraft.salt_fission_retriever: 放置在反應爐的側面 - 能夠從所有容器中回收枯竭燃料，有速度限制。
tile.nuclearcraft.salt_fission_redstone_: 用於開啟/關閉反應爐。透過比較器放置在此方塊旁，能夠讀取反應爐熱量。
tile.nuclearcraft.salt_fission_computer_: 熔融鹽反應爐電腦介面
用於透過 OpenComputers 連接反應爐。
tile.nuclearcraft.heat_exchanger_control: 熱交換器的核心 - 需要在側面置有一個才能成型。
tile.nuclearcraft.heat_exchanger_vent.de: 用於將流體輸入輸出熱交換器。能夠向（從）正在輸入（輸出）的管道輸出（輸入）。
tile.nuclearcraft.heat_exchanger_tube.de: 儲存並傳輸熱交換流體。如果在加熱/冷卻時與一個冷卻/加熱的熱交換管道相鄰，會以正比於與另一個管道的溫差的速率進行加熱/散熱。如果輸出的冷卻後流體的溫度比輸出的加熱後流體溫度高，相鄰的管道的流向不能平行。潛行時對著另一個管道放置能複製每一面的設定。
tile.nuclearcraft.heat_exchanger_condens: 儲存並傳輸需要冷凝的流體。冷凝速率正比於相鄰的比輸入流體冷的流體數量；相鄰的流體越多，冷凝速率越快。潛行時對著另一個冷凝管道放置能複製每一面的設定。
tile.nuclearcraft.heat_exchanger_compute: 用於透過 OpenComputers 連接熱交換器。
tile.nuclearcraft.turbine_controller.des: 渦輪機的核心 - 外殼需要一個渦輪機才能形成。
tile.nuclearcraft.turbine_wall.name: 渦輪外殼
tile.nuclearcraft.turbine_glass.name: 透明渦輪外殼
tile.nuclearcraft.turbine_frame.name: 渦輪機框架
tile.nuclearcraft.turbine_rotor_shaft.de: 透過將轉子葉片連接到渦輪來把動能轉換為電能。必須沿著渦輪機內部中軸放置成長方形。
tile.nuclearcraft.turbine_rotor_blade_ex: 極端合金製渦輪轉子葉片
tile.nuclearcraft.turbine_rotor_blade.de: 用於將沖入的流體的能量轉為葉片軸的轉動能。因為膨脹係數大於 1 ，所以每次流體透過一圈葉片，它的體積都會增加。必須以一圈四個在同一平面，從渦輪軸延伸到牆壁上的方式放置。每個葉片方塊能處理最多 %s 的進入的流體。
tile.nuclearcraft.turbine_rotor_stator.d: 用於壓縮流體體積，可以透過削減由葉片導致的膨脹帶來的損失來提高效率。必須以一圈四個在同一平面，從渦輪軸延伸到牆壁上的方式放置。
將轉子軸連接到渦輪機外殼和發電機。必須完全覆蓋轉子軸的每個末端。
tile.nuclearcraft.turbine_dynamo_coil.ma: 必須與至少一個軸承方塊相鄰。
tile.nuclearcraft.turbine_dynamo_coil.be: 必須與至少一個有效的鎂制渦輪發電機線圈相鄰。
tile.nuclearcraft.turbine_dynamo_coil.al: 必須與至少一個除了鋁製外的有效的發電機線圈相鄰。
tile.nuclearcraft.turbine_dynamo_coil.go: 必須與至少一個有效的鈹制渦輪發電機線圈相鄰。
tile.nuclearcraft.turbine_dynamo_coil.co: 必須至少與一個有效的金製渦輪發電機線圈相鄰。
tile.nuclearcraft.turbine_dynamo_coil.si: 至少與一個有效的鎂制渦輪發電機線圈和金製渦輪發電機線圈相鄰。
tile.nuclearcraft.turbine_inlet.name: 渦輪流體輸入口
tile.nuclearcraft.turbine_outlet.name: 渦輪流體輸出口
用於透過 OpenComputers 連接蒸汽輪機。
tile.nuclearcraft.electromagnet_supercoo: 需要%s和%s的液氦來保持啟動。
tile.nuclearcraft.helium_collector.name: 氦收集器
tile.nuclearcraft.water_source.name: 無限水
tile.nuclearcraft.radiation_scrubber.des: 減少所放置區塊的輻射等級。工作效率取決於所處的自由空間數量。消除其區塊中最大的 %s 輻射。%s
tile.nuclearcraft.radiation_scrubber_alt: 被放置的時候減小區塊的輻射等級。效率取決於其周圍的空餘空間。特殊的，它將移除該區塊最多 %s 的輻射，但是多個洗滌器的效率為非線性堆疊。早期輻射等級將會近似線性降低，最終呈雙指數降低。
info.nuclearcraft.radiation_scrubber_req: 需要 %s RF/t 和 %s 硼砂/s 執行。
info.nuclearcraft.radiation_scrubber_no_: 需要 %s RF/t 才能執行。
tile.nuclearcraft.geiger_block.name: 蓋革計數器方塊
tile.nuclearcraft.geiger_block.desc: 讀取所處區塊的輻射水平。
tile.nuclearcraft.glowing_mushroom.name: 螢光菇
tile.nuclearcraft.dry_earth.name: 荒地土
tile.nuclearcraft.tritium_lamp.name: 氚燈
tile.nuclearcraft.tritium_lantern.name: 氚提燈
tile.nuclearcraft.fluid_oxygen.name: 氧氣
tile.nuclearcraft.fluid_hydrogen.name: 氫
tile.nuclearcraft.fluid_deuterium.name: 氘

jei.nuclearcraft.coolant_heater.nak: 必須與一個啟動的分裂容器或者減速劑方塊相鄰。
jei.nuclearcraft.coolant_heater.redstone: 必須與至少一個啟動的分裂容器相鄰。
jei.nuclearcraft.coolant_heater.quartz_n: 必須與至少一個啟動的減速劑方塊相鄰。
jei.nuclearcraft.coolant_heater.gold_nak: 必須與至少一個啟動的鈉鉀冷卻液加熱器和一個啟動的鈉鉀-紅石冷卻液加熱器相鄰。
jei.nuclearcraft.coolant_heater.glowston: 必須與至少兩個啟動的減速劑方塊相鄰。
jei.nuclearcraft.coolant_heater.lapis_na: 必須他至少一個啟動的分裂容器和一個反應爐外殼相鄰。
jei.nuclearcraft.coolant_heater.diamond_: 必須與至少一個啟動的鈉鉀冷卻液加熱器和一個啟動的鈉鉀-石英冷卻液加熱器相鄰。
jei.nuclearcraft.coolant_heater.liquidhe: 必須與恰好一個啟動的鈉鉀-紅石冷卻液加熱器和至少一個反應爐外殼相鄰。
jei.nuclearcraft.coolant_heater.ender_na: 必須與位於角落的三個反應爐外殼相鄰。
jei.nuclearcraft.coolant_heater.cryotheu: 必須與至少兩個分裂容器相鄰。
jei.nuclearcraft.coolant_heater.iron_nak: 必須與至少一個啟動的鈉鉀-金冷卻液加熱器相鄰。
jei.nuclearcraft.coolant_heater.emerald_: 必須與至少一個啟動的加速劑方塊一個啟動的分裂容器相鄰。
jei.nuclearcraft.coolant_heater.copper_n: 必須與至少一個啟動的鈉鉀-螢光石冷卻液加熱器相鄰。
jei.nuclearcraft.coolant_heater.tin_nak: 必須在同一條軸上與兩個有效的鈉鉀-青金石冷卻液加熱器相鄰。
jei.nuclearcraft.coolant_heater.magnesiu: 必須與至少一個反應爐外殼一個啟動的減速劑方塊相鄰。
gui.config.ores.ore_dims.comment: 生成礦物的維度的白名單/黑名單
gui.config.ores.ore_dims_list_type.comme: 維度表是白名單（false）還是黑名單（true）？
gui.config.ores.ore_gen.comment: 是否會生成礦物？順序：銅，錫，鉛，釷，鈾，硼，鋰，鎂。
gui.config.ores.ore_size.comment: 每個區塊礦物生成的個數。順序：銅，錫，鉛，釷，鈾，硼，鋰，鎂。
gui.config.ores.ore_rate.comment: 礦物生成的機率。順序：銅，錫，鉛，釷，鈾，硼，鋰，鎂。
gui.config.ores.ore_min_height.comment: 生成礦物的y軸最小值。順序：銅，錫，鉛，釷，鈾，硼，鋰，鎂。
gui.config.ores.ore_max_height.comment: 生成礦物的y軸最大值。順序：銅，錫，鉛，釷，鈾，硼，鋰，鎂。
gui.config.ores.ore_drops.comment: 是否原版礦物會掉落額外資源？順序：菱錳，鈹粉，鋯粉，氟石，硫磺，氟鹽，方氟鉀石。
gui.config.ores.hide_disabled_ores.comme: 是否從礦物詞典和JEI中隱藏未開啟的礦物?
gui.config.ores.ore_harvest_levels.comme: 鎬子挖掘礦的等級。順序：銅，錫，鉛，釷，鈾，硼，鋰，鎂。
gui.config.processors.processor_time.com: 基礎每tick處理。順序：小製造機，同位素分離器，衰變加速器，燃料處理器，合金爐，流體注入器，金屬熔化機，超冷卻器，電解機，中子輻照器，金屬成型機，壓縮機，化學反應器，鹽混合器，結晶器，溶解器，流體提取機，離心機，碎石機。
gui.config.processors.processor_power.co: 基礎處理時RF/t消耗。順序：小製造機，同位素分離器，衰變加速器，燃料處理器，合金爐，流體注入器，金屬熔化機，超冷卻器，電解機，中子輻照器，金屬成型機，壓縮機，化學反應器，鹽混合器，結晶器，溶解器，流體提取機，離心機，碎石機。
gui.config.processors.speed_upgrade_powe: 速度升級能量規則。順序：處理時間，處理能量。
gui.config.processors.speed_upgrade_mult: 基礎速度升級倍數。順序：處理時間，處理能量。
gui.config.processors.energy_upgrade_pow: 能量升級耗能規則。遵循：處理耗能。
gui.config.processors.energy_upgrade_mul: 能量升級的基礎倍率。遵循：處理耗能。
gui.config.processors.rf_per_eu.comment: 在 RF 和 IC2 的 EU 之間轉化。
gui.config.processors.enable_gtce_eu: 啟用 GTCE EU 相容
gui.config.processors.enable_gtce_eu.com: 設定為 true，NC 的機器能夠相容 GTCE 模組的能量。
gui.config.processors.enable_mek_gas.com: 如果設定為真，核電工藝的機器可以處理通用機械的氣體

nuclearcraft.multiblock_validation.turbi: 必須有兩組位於相對的蒸汽輪機牆的轉子軸承
裝有轉子軸承的牆面必須是正方形的
入口和出口必須在裝有轉子軸承的牆上相對安裝
轉子軸承必須為正方形並且在相對的兩面牆的中心
轉子軸必須被完全連接在轉子軸承上
每個轉子葉片和渦輪定子之間必須空開空間
每個轉子軸上的轉子葉片或渦輪定子必須為相同類型
每一段轉子軸上的轉子葉片或渦輪定子必須被完全延伸到牆上

tile.nuclearcraft.condenser_tube.desc: Holds and transports fluids to condense. The condensation rate is proportional to the number of adjacent blocks of fluid colder than the input condensing fluid temperature; the colder the adjacent fluid, the faster the condensation - the speed bonus is the natural logarithm of the ratio of the fluids' temperatures. Place against another condensation tube while sneaking to copy across its side configuration.

tile.nuclearcraft.radiation_scrubber_non: Reduces the radiation level of the chunk it is placed in. Its effectiveness depends on the amount of free space around it. Alone, it will remove a maximum of %s of the radiation in its chunk at %s efficiency, though the collective contribution from all scrubbers in the chunk will stack non-linearly. The radiation level will fall approximately linearly at first, but eventually doubly exponentially in the limit of many scrubbers. The efficiency and required power depends on the rad-clearing agent being used.

tile.nuclearcraft.quantum_computer_gate_: Quantum Computer Pauli-X Gate
Rotates the target qubits by 180 degrees about the X-axis of the Bloch sphere.
Quantum Computer Pauli-Y Gate
Rotates the target qubits by 180 degrees about the Y-axis of the Bloch sphere.
Quantum Computer Pauli-Z Gate
Rotates the target qubits by 180 degrees about the Z-axis of the Bloch sphere.
Quantum Computer Hadamard Gate
Applies a Hadamard transform to the target qubits.
Quantum Computer S Gate
Shifts the phase of the true-value components of the target qubits by 90 degrees.
Quantum Computer Inverse S Gate
Shifts the phase of the true-value components of the target qubits by 270 degrees.
Quantum Computer T Gate
Shifts the phase of the true-value components of the target qubits by 45 degrees.
Quantum Computer Inverse T Gate
Shifts the phase of the true-value components of the target qubits by 315 degrees.
Quantum Computer Phase Gate
Shifts the phase of the true-value components of the target qubits by a chosen angle.
Quantum Computer X-Rotation Gate
Rotates the target qubits about the spatial X-axis.
Quantum Computer Y-Rotation Gate
Rotates the target qubits about the spatial Y-axis.
Quantum Computer Z-Rotation Gate
Rotates the target qubits about the spatial Z-axis.
Quantum Computer Controlled Pauli-X Gate
Performs a controlled rotation on the target qubits by 180 degrees about the X-axis of the Bloch sphere.
Quantum Computer Controlled Pauli-Y Gate
Performs a controlled rotation on the target qubits by 180 degrees about the Y-axis of the Bloch sphere.
Quantum Computer Controlled Pauli-Z Gate
Performs a controlled rotation on the target qubits by 180 degrees about the Z-axis of the Bloch sphere.
Quantum Computer Controlled Hadamard Gate
Applies a controlled Hadamard transform to the target qubits.
Quantum Computer Controlled S Gate
Performs a controlled phase shift on the true-value components of the target qubits by 90 degrees.
Quantum Computer Controlled Inverse S Gate
Performs a controlled phase shift on the true-value components of the target qubits by 270 degrees.
Quantum Computer Controlled T Gate
Performs a controlled phase shift on the true-value components of the target qubits by 45 degrees.
Quantum Computer Controlled Inverse T Gate
Performs a controlled phase shift on the true-value components of the target qubits by 315 degrees.
Quantum Computer Controlled Phase Gate
Performs a controlled phase shift on the true-value components of the target qubits by a chosen angle.
Quantum Computer Controlled X-Rotation Gate
Performs a controlled rotation on the target qubits about the spatial X-axis.
Quantum Computer Controlled Y-Rotation Gate
Performs a controlled rotation on the target qubits about the spatial Y-axis.
Quantum Computer Controlled Z-Rotation Gate
Performs a controlled rotation on the target qubits about the spatial Z-axis.
Quantum Computer Swap Gate
Swaps two lists of qubits.
Quantum Computer Controlled Swap Gate
Performs a controlled swap on two lists of qubits.
Used to access the quantum computer via OpenComputers.

gui.nc.config.ore_dims.comment: List of IDs of dimensions to whitelist/blacklist for ore generation.
gui.nc.config.ore_dims_list_type.comment: Is the dimension list a whitelist (false) or a blacklist (true)?
gui.nc.config.ore_gen.comment: Will these ores generate in the world? Order: copper, tin, lead, thorium, uranium, boron, lithium, magnesium.
gui.nc.config.ore_size.comment: Numbers of ore blocks per ore chunk. Order: copper, tin, lead, thorium, uranium, boron, lithium, magnesium.
gui.nc.config.ore_rate.comment: Rates at which ores generate (uses a vanilla-style ore generator). Order: copper, tin, lead, thorium, uranium, boron, lithium, magnesium.
gui.nc.config.ore_min_height.comment: Minimum heights at which ores generate. Order: copper, tin, lead, thorium, uranium, boron, lithium, magnesium.
gui.nc.config.ore_max_height.comment: Maximum heights at which ores generate. Order: copper, tin, lead, thorium, uranium, boron, lithium, magnesium.
gui.nc.config.ore_drops.comment: Will vanilla ores drop extra resources? Order: rhodochrosite, beryllium dust, zirconium dust, fluorite, sulfur, villiaumite, carobbiite.
gui.nc.config.ore_hide_disabled.comment: Remove disabled ores from the Ore Dictionary and JEI?
gui.nc.config.ore_harvest_levels.comment: Pickaxe harvest levels of ores. Order: copper, tin, lead, thorium, uranium, boron, lithium, magnesium.
gui.nc.config.wasteland_biome.comment: Will wasteland biomes generate in the overworld?
gui.nc.config.wasteland_biome_weight.com: The weight assigned to the generation of the wasteland biomes - higher numbers correspond to higher generation rates.
gui.nc.config.wasteland_dimension_gen.co: Will the wasteland dimension be generated?
gui.nc.config.wasteland_dimension.commen: Sets the ID for the wasteland dimension.
gui.nc.config.mushroom_spread_rate.comme: The rate at which mushrooms added by NC will spread - higher numbers correspond to higher spread rates.
gui.nc.config.mushroom_gen.comment: Will mushrooms added by NC generate in the nether and wasteland biomes?
gui.nc.config.mushroom_gen_size.comment: Determines the maximum number of mushrooms added by NC that will spawn at a time. Note that this is typically much higher than the mean number of generated mushrooms.
gui.nc.config.mushroom_gen_rate.comment: Determines how often mushrooms added by NC will spawn - higher numbers correspond to higher generation rates.

gui.nc.config.rf_per_eu.comment: Conversion ratio between Redstone Flux and IC2 and GTCE Energy Units.

gui.nc.config.fission_force_heat_compara: If enabled, the controller of a heat-negative or heat-neutral reactor will output a heat-based comparator signal as if it were heat-positive instead of an energy-based one.
gui.nc.config.fission_sound_volume.comme: Modifier for the volume of fission sound effects.
gui.nc.config.fission_moderator_extra_po: *Only effects new mechanics.* Determines the extra power generated by each moderator block adjacent to a reactor cell. Equal to the effective number of extra cell's worth of power that would be generated by a cell totally surrounded by moderator blocks. Each moderator block will contribute one sixth of this amount of power (the amount of additional power scales linearly with the number of moderator blocks).
gui.nc.config.fission_moderator_extra_he: *Only effects new mechanics.* Determines the extra heat generated by each moderator block adjacent to a reactor cell. Equal to the effective number of extra cell's worth of heat that would be generated by a cell totally surrounded by moderator blocks. Each moderator block will contribute one sixth of this amount of heat (the amount of additional heat scales linearly with the number of moderator blocks).
gui.nc.config.fission_neutron_reach.comm: *Only effects new mechanics.* Maximum number of moderator blocks that can be between two cells for neutron radiation to be shared between them and their efficiency to increase.

gui.nc.config.heat_exchanger_conductivit: Multiplier for heat transfer rate to and from this type of tube. For heat exchanging tubes, heating recipes will be faster by this factor while cooling recipes will be slower by this factor. For condensation tubes, recipes will simply be faster by this factor. Order: copper, hard carbon, thermoconducting alloy.
gui.nc.config.heat_exchanger_coolant_mul: Multiplier for the heat required to cool hot coolant.
gui.nc.config.heat_exchanger_alternate_e: Will exhaust steam be heated into standard steam rather than low pressure steam?

gui.nc.config.turbine_power_per_mb.comme: Base RF produced per processed mB of this type of steam. Order: high pressure, low pressure, standard.
gui.nc.config.turbine_expansion_level.co: Expansion level for this type of steam's recipe. Order: high pressure, low pressure, standard.
gui.nc.config.turbine_spin_up_multiplier: Rotor spin-up multiplier for this type of steam's recipe. Order: high pressure, low pressure, standard.
gui.nc.config.turbine_mb_per_blade.comme: Maximum mB of fluid processed per tick per rotor blade.
gui.nc.config.turbine_sound_volume.comme: Modifier for the volume of turbine sound effects.
gui.nc.config.accelerator_electromagnet_: RF/t required to keep a superconducting electromagnet active.
gui.nc.config.accelerator_supercooler_co: mB/t of liquid helium required to keep a superconducting supercooler active.
gui.nc.config.quantum_server_enabled.com: Will quantum computers form on dedicated servers? Disabled by default to prevent players using up server memory, and because generated code is not sent to clients but instead stored in the server's directory.
gui.nc.config.quantum_max_qubits_live.co: The maximum number of actively calculating qubits a single quantum computer multiblock can have. !!!WARNING!!! Allowing for complex circuits of more than seven qubits will begin to seriously impact performance and use up a huge amount of memory. Increase this limit with EXTREME caution!
gui.nc.config.quantum_max_qubits_code.co: The maximum number of qubits a single quantum computer multiblock can have for generating code. !!!WARNING!!! Gates with more control qubits will take increasingly more work and memory to decompile into basic operations, thus will generate increasingly mode code. If generating QASM code, IBM Q Experience's circuit composer will begin to struggle to deal with more than a few hundred lines. Increase this limit with EXTREME caution!
gui.nc.config.quantum_angle_precision.co: Controls the precision allowed for setting the working angle of gates by defining the number of available angles, uniformly distributed from 0 to 360 degrees.
gui.nc.config.tool_mining_level:
Mining Levels

gui.nc.config.tool_durability.comment: Max number of tool uses. Order: boron, boron spaxelhoe, tough alloy, tough alloy spaxelhoe, hard carbon, hard carbon spaxelhoe, boron nitride, boron nitride spaxelhoe.

Mining Speeds

Attack Damages

gui.nc.config.tool_enchantability.commen: Determines the quality of applied enchantments. Order: boron, boron spaxelhoe, tough alloy, tough alloy spaxelhoe, hard carbon, hard carbon spaxelhoe, boron nitride, boron nitride spaxelhoe.
gui.nc.config.tool_handle_modifier.comme: Determines the Tinkers' Construct handle modifiers of the materials. Order: boron, tough alloy, hard carbon, boron nitride.
gui.nc.config.armor_durability.comment: Durabilities of armor types. Order: boron, tough alloy, hard carbon, boron nitride, hazmat.
gui.nc.config.armor_boron.comment: Effectiveness of individual armor pieces. Order: boots, legs, chest, helm.
gui.nc.config.armor_tough.comment: Effectiveness of individual armor pieces. Order: boots, legs, chest, helm.
gui.nc.config.armor_hard_carbon.comment: Effectiveness of individual armor pieces. Order: boots, legs, chest, helm.
gui.nc.config.armor_boron_nitride.commen: Effectiveness of individual armor pieces. Order: boots, legs, chest, helm.
gui.nc.config.armor_hazmat.comment: Effectiveness of individual armor pieces. Order: boots, legs, chest, helm.
gui.nc.config.armor_enchantability.comme: Determines the quality of applied enchantments. Order: boron, tough alloy, hard carbon, boron nitride, hazmat.
gui.nc.config.armor_toughness.comment: Toughnesses of armor types. Order: boron, tough alloy, hard carbon, boron nitride, hazmat.
gui.nc.config.entity_tracking_range.comm: The range at which Minecraft will send tracking updates for NC entities.
gui.nc.config.radiation_enabled.comment: Will nuclear radiation exist in the world? Note that the game will require a restart for radiation-related items to be shown in JEI after enabling this feature.
gui.nc.config.radiation_world_chunks_per: The maximum number of chunks in which radiation will be updated per tick.
gui.nc.config.radiation_player_tick_rate: The number of ticks between each player radiation update.
gui.nc.config.radiation_worlds.comment: List of dimensions and their background radiation levels. Format: 'dimID_radiationLevel'.
gui.nc.config.radiation_biomes.comment: List of biomes and their background radiation levels. These values stack with the underlying world's background radiation. Format: 'modid:biomeName_radiationLevel'.
gui.nc.config.radiation_structures.comme: List of structures and their background radiation levels. These values stack with the underlying world or biome's background radiation. Format: 'structureName_radiationLevel'.
gui.nc.config.radiation_world_limits.com: List of dimensions and their radiation level limits. Format: 'dimID_radiationLimit'.
gui.nc.config.radiation_biome_limits.com: List of biomes and their radiation level limits. These values stack with the underlying world's background radiation. Format: 'modid:biomeName_radiationLimit'.
gui.nc.config.radiation_from_biomes_dims: List of IDs of dimensions to blacklist for biome background radiation.
gui.nc.config.radiation_ores.comment: List of ore dict entries and their stack radiation levels. Can be used to overwrite default values. Can use Unix-style wildcards for the ore name. Format: 'oreName_radiationLevel'.
gui.nc.config.radiation_items.comment: List of items and their stack radiation levels. Can be used to overwrite default values. Format: 'modid:name:meta_radiationLevel'.
gui.nc.config.radiation_blocks.comment: List of blocks and their radiation levels. Can be used to overwrite default values. Format: 'modid:name:meta_radiationLevel'.
gui.nc.config.radiation_fluids.comment: List of fluids and their radiation levels. Can be used to overwrite default values. If the fluid has a corresponding block, then it will also be given a radiation level. Format: 'fluidName_radiationLevel'.
gui.nc.config.radiation_foods.comment: List of foods and the rads and rad resistance gained on consumption. Negative values mean rads and rad resistance will be lost. Can be used to overwrite default values. Format: 'modid:name:meta_radiationLevel_radiationResistance'.
gui.nc.config.radiation_ores_blacklist.c: List of ore dict entries that will be forced not have a radiation level. Can use Unix-style wildcards for the ore name. Format: 'oreName'.
List of items that will be forced not have a radiation level. Format: 'modid:name:meta'.
gui.nc.config.radiation_blocks_blacklist: List of blocks that will be forced not have a radiation level. Format: 'modid:name:meta'.
gui.nc.config.radiation_fluids_blacklist: List of fluids that will be forced not have a radiation level. Format: 'fluidName'.
gui.nc.config.max_player_rads.comment: The maximum number of rads a player can have before the radiation is fatal.
gui.nc.config.radiation_player_decay_rat: The rate at which player radiation decreases over time, as a fraction of the player's current radiation level per tick.
gui.nc.config.max_entity_rads.comment: List of entities and their maximum rad counts. Used to overwrite default values (100 Rad per heart of health). Format: 'modid:name_maxRads'.
gui.nc.config.radiation_entity_decay_rat: The rate at which entity radiation decreases over time, as a fraction of the entity's current radiation level per tick.
gui.nc.config.radiation_spread_rate.comm: Controls the rate at which radiation will spread from chunk to chunk.
Controls how high the ratio of radiation levels between chunks must be for radiation to spread between them.
gui.nc.config.radiation_decay_rate.comme: Controls the rate at which radiation decreases in a chunk over time.
gui.nc.config.radiation_lowest_rate.comm: The lowest rate of player and chunk irradiation possible in Rad/t - amounts below this are ignored.
gui.nc.config.radiation_chunk_limit.comm: The maximum chunk radiation level possible in Rad/t. A negative value means there is no limit.
gui.nc.config.radiation_sound_volumes.co: Modifiers for the volumes of radiation sound effects. Order: Geiger counter ticking, RadAway use, Rad-X use, food effects, chems wearing off, radiation badge breaking, radiation level warning, feral ghoul attack.
gui.nc.config.radiation_block_effect_max: The maximum number of attempts per chunk radiation update to mutate blocks.
gui.nc.config.radiation_rain_mult.commen: Multiplies the rate of irradiation while in rain.
gui.nc.config.radiation_swim_mult.commen: Multiplies the rate of irradiation while swimming.
gui.nc.config.radiation_radaway_amount.c: The total number of rads removed when using RadAway.
gui.nc.config.radiation_radaway_slow_amo: The total number of rads removed when using Slow-Acting RadAway.
gui.nc.config.radiation_radaway_rate.com: The rate at which rads is removed when using RadAway in Rad/t.
gui.nc.config.radiation_radaway_slow_rat: The rate at which rads is removed when using Slow-Acting RadAway in Rad/t.
gui.nc.config.radiation_poison_time.comm: The time taken for a dose of radiation poisoning to be added to the player's rad count in ticks.
gui.nc.config.radiation_radaway_cooldown: The time that must be waited between doses of RadAway in ticks.
gui.nc.config.radiation_rad_x_amount.com: Controls the amount of rad resistance gained when consuming Rad-X.
gui.nc.config.radiation_rad_x_lifetime.c: The time taken for one dose of Rad-X to wear off in ticks.
gui.nc.config.radiation_rad_x_cooldown.c: The time that must be waited between doses of Rad-X in ticks.
The rad resistance levels provided by the three levels of shielding. Order: light, medium, heavy.
gui.nc.config.radiation_tile_shielding.c: If enabled along with hardcore containers, radiation shielding can be applied to tile entities.
gui.nc.config.radiation_hazmat_shielding: The rad resistance levels provided by each piece of the hazmat suit. Order: headwear, chestpiece, leggings, boots.
gui.nc.config.radiation_scrubber_fractio: The maximum rate at which a 100% efficiency scrubber will remove radiation as a fraction of the radiation level of the chunk it is in. Only applies when using linear scrubbing mechanics.
The range of scrubbers' search for occluding blocks.
gui.nc.config.radiation_scrubber_non_lin: Use a non-linear scrubbing rate equation instead of the linear behaviour?
gui.nc.config.radiation_scrubber_param:
Non-linear Scrubber Parameters
gui.nc.config.radiation_scrubber_param.comment=The four parameters a,b,c,d in the non-linear scrubbing rate equation 'F = a^[-(S/b)^(1 + S/c)^(1/d)]', where 'F' is the remaining fraction of radiation left in the chunk's update buffer after scrubbing and 'S' is the effective number of scrubbers in the chunk after accounting for their efficiencies. It is recommended that you only modify these if you know what you are doing.
gui.nc.config.radiation_scrubber_time.co: The lifetime in ticks of one item or 250 mB of fluid in an active scrubber. Order: borax dust, RadAway, Slow-Acting RadAway
gui.nc.config.radiation_scrubber_power.c: The power in RF/t scrubbers need to be supplied to run with these ingredients. Order: borax dust, RadAway, Slow-Acting RadAway
gui.nc.config.radiation_scrubber_efficie: The efficiency multiplier of an active scrubber using these ingredients. Order: borax dust, RadAway, Slow-Acting RadAway
gui.nc.config.radiation_geiger_block_red: The radiation level, as a power of ten, at which the Geiger counter block will emit a full-strength comparator signal.
gui.nc.config.radiation_shielding_defaul: If enabled, radiation shielding attachment recipes will be added for all registered armor pieces.
gui.nc.config.radiation_shielding_item_b: List of armor item stacks for which shielding recipes will not be added by default. Format: 'modid:armorName:meta'.
gui.nc.config.radiation_shielding_custom: List of armor item stacks for which shielding recipes will be added. Mostly used when the automated shielding recipes are disabled. Format: 'modid:armorName:meta'.
gui.nc.config.radiation_shielding_defaul: List of armor item stacks and their default radiation shielding levels. Format: 'modid:armorName:meta_resistance'. Note: this is not the only way to add these values if you have CraftTweaker installed. Rad resistance can also be given to armor by changing their recipe such that an NBT tag called "ncRadiationResistance" with the double value equal to the resistance level is attached to it.
gui.nc.config.radiation_hud_size.comment: Modifier for the size of radiation info on the HUD.
gui.nc.config.radiation_hud_position.com: Angle from the centre of the screen at which radiation info appears on the HUD. 0 degrees is the top of the screen, 45 is top-right, etc.
gui.nc.config.radiation_hud_position_car: Optional config to specify where the rads overlay should appear on the screen if not wanted on a side or at a corner - if used, this config will be used in place of the angle-based one. Two doubles are required [x, y] which specify how far right (x) and how far down (y) from the top-left corner of the screen the overlay is drawn at.
gui.nc.config.radiation_hud_text_outline: If enabled, a black outline will surround the radiation counter text underneath the rad bar.
If disabled, the rads overlay will show and the ticking will be heard even when a Geiger counter is not being held.
gui.nc.config.radiation_chunk_boundaries: If enabled, chunk boundaries will be shown while holding or looking at a Geiger counter block or radiation scrubber.
gui.nc.config.radiation_unit_prefixes.co: If set to a positive integer, radiation levels will be shown without unit prefixes to this number of significant figures.
gui.nc.config.radiation_badge_durability: Determines the total radiation that a Radiation Badge can be exposed to before disintegrating.
Determines the amount of exposed radiation after which the Radiation Badge will inform the player of its total exposure level as a fraction of the durability.
If enabled, the radioactive stacks in a player's inventory will irradiate the chunk the player is in as well as the player directly, and will also irradiate the chunk if left to despawn as an entity.
gui.nc.config.radiation_hardcore_contain: The radioactive stacks in container blocks will irradiate the chunk the tile entity is in at a rate of this fraction of their base radiation level.
gui.nc.config.radiation_dropped_items.co: Radioactive items dropped on the ground will irradiate the chunk they are in.
gui.nc.config.radiation_death_persist.co: If enabled, players' radiation levels will persist on death.
gui.nc.config.radiation_death_persist_fr: Specifies the fraction of the player's radiation level that persists if Radiation Death Persistence is enabled.
gui.nc.config.radiation_death_immunity_t: Number of seconds players will have radiation immunity after death due to radiation.
gui.nc.config.radiation_player_debuff_li: Lists of potion effects experienced at various percentages of radiation level by players. Format: 'radPercent_potionNameA@strength,potionNameB@strength,...,potionNameZ@strength'.
gui.nc.config.radiation_passive_debuff_l: Lists of potion effects experienced at various percentages of radiation level by passive entities. Format: 'radPercent_potionNameA@strength,potionNameB@strength,...,potionNameZ@strength'.
gui.nc.config.radiation_mob_buff_lists.c: Lists of potion effects experienced at various percentages of radiation level by mobs. Format: 'radPercent_potionNameA@strength,potionNameB@strength,...,potionNameZ@strength'.
gui.nc.config.radiation_player_rads_fata: If enabled, players will be killed when they reach their maximum rad count.
gui.nc.config.radiation_passive_rads_fat: If enabled, passive entities will be killed when they reach their maximum rad count.
gui.nc.config.radiation_mob_rads_fatal.c: If enabled, mobs will be killed when they reach their maximum rad count.
gui.nc.config.radiation_horse_armor.comm: If enabled, horses can be equipped with radiation-protective armor.
gui.nc.config.register_processor.comment: Register processors to the game? Order: Nuclear Furnace, Manufactory, Separator, Decay Hastener, Fuel Reprocessor, Alloy Furnace, Fluid Infuser, Melter, Supercooler, Electrolyzer, Assembler, Ingot Former, Pressurizer, Chemical Reactor, Fluid Mixer, Crystallizer, Fluid Enricher, Fluid Extractor, Centrifuge, Rock Crusher.

gui.nc.config.register_battery.comment: Register battery blocks to the game? Order: Voltaic Pile, Lithium Ion Battery.
gui.nc.config.register_quantum.comment: Register quantum computers to the game?
gui.nc.config.register_tool.comment: Register tool types to the game? Order: boron, tough alloy, hard carbon, boron nitride.
gui.nc.config.register_tic_tool.comment: Will these materials be registered as tool materials for Tinkers' Construct? Order: boron, tough alloy, hard carbon, boron nitride, thorium, uranium, magnesium, chocolate.
gui.nc.config.register_armor.comment: Register armor types to the game? Order: boron, tough alloy, hard carbon, boron nitride.
gui.nc.config.register_conarm_armor.comm: Will these materials be registered as armor materials for Construct's Armory? Order: boron, tough alloy, hard carbon, boron nitride, thorium, uranium, magnesium, chocolate.
gui.nc.config.register_entity.comment: Will these entities be registered to spawn? Order: feral ghoul.
gui.nc.config.register_fluid_blocks.comm: Register fluid blocks? Keep false if running low on block IDs.
gui.nc.config.register_cofh_fluids.comme: Register alternative Thermal Foundation fluids? It is recommended that this is set to true if no CoFH mods are installed.
gui.nc.config.register_projecte_emc.comm: Register NC raw material EMC values if ProjectE is installed?
gui.nc.config.single_creative_tab.commen: Combine all creative tabs into a single large one?
gui.nc.config.ctrl_info.comment: Hold down the control key rather than the shift key to show extra tooltip info?
gui.nc.config.jei_chance_items_include_n: Will the chance item output cycle in JEI include empty stacks if a possible output stack size is 0? If false, a minimum stack size of 1 shall be shown - although some info about the recipe is lost this way, it looks much neater. This will only effect the outputs in JEI and not the actual functioning of the machines.
gui.nc.config.dungeon_loot.comment: Will NuclearCraft loot generate in chests?
gui.nc.config.ore_dict_raw_material_reci: Enable Ore Dict Raw Material Recipes
Will Ore Dictionary inputs be used for 'ingot <-> block' crafting and 'dust -> ingot' furnace recipes? If false, the NC ingredient will be used.
gui.nc.config.ore_dict_priority_bool.com: Will Ore Dictionary outputs be prioritised according to the mod list below? If false, the default Ore Dict entry will be used when deciding machine outputs.
gui.nc.config.ore_dict_priority.comment: Determines the priority of each mod's ore dictionary entries - earlier mods' IDs in this list have a higher priority. This is used to determine which mod's corresponding item is produced in machine recipes. If no matching mod is found, the default entry is used.

nc.guide_book.name: NuclearCraft Guide
nc.guide_book.desc:
NuclearCraft (NC) is a tech mod focused on nuclear power generation. Most of the mod's features and mechanics are inspired by real equivalents, though there are many simplifications, abstractions, and deviations from reality for the sake of interesting gameplay.
